trends: There has been one other sighting in Bellefontaine
There were no other sightings in Bellefontaine on or around June 30th 1997
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: BRIGHT SHINEY SILVER BLIMP SHAPED OBJECT
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS IN JULY OF 1997,I WAS DRIVING SOUTH ON US ROUTE 68 SOUTH FROM KENTON,OHIO TOWARDS BELLEFONTAINE,OHIO,WHEN I NOTICED A VERY BRIGHT SHINEY SILVER METALLIC OBJECT IN THE CLEAR BLUE SKY!,AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS A BLIMP,I PULLED MY CAR TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD TO GET OUT AND LOOK AT IT,BECAUSE IN THIS RURAL FARMING AREA OF OHIO,WE DON'T SEE THINGS LIKE THAT VERY OFTEN!AS I WATCHED IT,IT WAS JUST SILENTLY HOVERING IN THE SKY,I WATCHED IT JUST SITTING THERE IN MID AIR FOR APPROXAMTELY 4 MINUTES OR SO,TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT EXACTLY I WAS SEEING!KNOWING THAT A BLIMP HAS TAIL FINS,AND AN UNDER CARRIAGE COMPARTMENT,THIS OBJECT DID NOT!AS I WATCHED IT I WAS ALERTED TO A RUMBLING IN THE SKY TO THE SOUTHWEST OF THE OBJECT,WHEN I LOOKED,I SEEN 5 AIRFORCE FIGHTER JETS APPROACHING(WHICH ARE NEVER SEEN IN THIS AREA) AT A VERY FAST SPEED,THEY WERE IN A TRIANGLE FORMATION,THEY WERE FLYING AT A MUCH LOWER ALTITUDE THAN THE OBJECT,IT WAS AT THIS POINT I CAME TO THE REALIZATION THAT WHAT I WAS SEEING WAS IN FACT A UFO!!,AS THEY APPROACHED,THE UFO SHOT STRAIGHT UP INTO THE SKY AT A SPEED THAT WAS INCREDIBLE,THE 5 AIRFORCE FIGHTER JETS DID A CIRCULAR FLY AROUND,AND HEADED BACK SOUTH TOWARDS DAYTON,OHIO!!UNTIL THAT DAY I WAS SKEPTICAL OF THE WHOLE UFO MATTER,BUT AFTER MY EXPERIENCE I NOW KNOW IT TO BE FACT!!
